text: Ninian Park was a football stadium in Leckwith, Cardiff, Wales. It was the home ground of Cardiff City F.C. for 99 years. It was opened in 1910, and closed in 2009. At the time of the stadium's closing, it had a seating capacity of 21,508. In July 2009, Cardiff City's new ground, Cardiff City Stadium, opened. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Cardiff Category:Football in Wales Category:Football stadiums in the United Kingdom Category:Sport in Wales
title: Ninian Park
